info.description: API documentation for the Poll service.
info.title: Poll Service API

get.description: Retrieve all polls created for a sheet.
Retrieve users with pagination (super admin only).
Retrieve published polls for a sheet.

post.description: Create a poll associated with a sheet.
Update fields of an existing poll.
Authenticate a user using email and password and receive tokens.
Approve a pending notification (super admin only).
Reject a pending notification (super admin only).

get.description: Retrieve the profile for the authenticated user.

post.description: Exchange an existing refresh token for a new access/refresh token pair.

parameters.description: Refresh token when cookie is unavailable
parameters.name: refreshToken

post.description: Create a new sheet (verified admin or super admin).

get.description: Retrieve sheets depending on admin role.

post.description: Register a new user and receive access and refresh tokens.
